Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Ashburn in 1984...
Traded from Ashburn to Bay City on 1/31/1987 (Going to Ash: C J. Jones, 2B A. Valvo. Going to BC: LF F. Aguilar)...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1987, off Carl Peak (Mal)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/27/1987, off Russell Anderson (Ash)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Malibu on 9/16/1987...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1987, hitting .331 with 22 HR, 94 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/29/1989, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1990, hitting .407 with 3 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1990, hitting .500 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
